intro: Relhania rotundifolia, commonly known as the round-leafed relhania, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil, and thrives in humid, shaded environments. Relhania rotundifolia is also used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
